parameters.command: CONTAINER='{{ $json["container_name"] }}'; if [ -n "$CONTAINER" ]; then docker logs --tail 50 "$CONTAINER" 2>&1; else echo 'ERROR: No container name provided'; fi

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ task: $json.task, working_directory: $json.working_directory, model: $json.model, max_steps: $json.max_steps, source: $json.source, triggered_by: $json.triggered_by }) }}
